titleStmt.title: A world of vvonders: or An introduction to a treatise touching the conformitie of ancient and moderne wonders or a preparatiue treatise to the Apologie for Herodotus. The argument whereof is taken from the Apologie for Herodotus written in Latine by Henrie Stephen, and continued here by the author himselfe. Translated out of the best corrected French copie.
Apologia pro Herodoto. English
titleStmt.author: Estienne, Henri, 1531-1598.
Carew, Richard, 1555-1620, attributed name.
R. C., fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by Richard Field] for Iohn Norton,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Estienne, Henri. Apologie pour Hérodote.
Translator's dedication signed: R.C., i.e. Richard Carew?.
"The second part of the preparatiue treatise to the Apology for Herodotus" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Identified as STC 10554 on UMI microfilm reel 787.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
Appears at reel 342 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 787 (British Library copy).
